Basic:
const Basic = () => (
  <Tooltip>
    <TooltipTrigger>Hover Me</TooltipTrigger>
    <Portal>
      <TooltipPositioner>
        <TooltipContent>I am a tooltip!</TooltipContent>
      </TooltipPositioner>
    </Portal>
  </Tooltip>
)
RenderFn:
const RenderFn = () => (
  <Tooltip>
    {({ isOpen }) => (
      <>
        <TooltipTrigger>Hover Me</TooltipTrigger>
        <Portal>
          <TooltipPositioner>
            <TooltipContent>This tooltip is open: {isOpen.toString()}</TooltipContent>
          </TooltipPositioner>
        </Portal>
      </>
    )}
  </Tooltip>
)
Arrow:
const Arrow = () => (
  <Tooltip>
    <TooltipTrigger>Hove Me</TooltipTrigger>
    <Portal>
      <TooltipPositioner>
        <TooltipContent>
          <TooltipArrow>
            <TooltipArrowTip />
          </TooltipArrow>
          I am a tooltip!
        </TooltipContent>
      </TooltipPositioner>
    </Portal>
  </Tooltip>
)
Timings:
const Timings = () => (
  <Tooltip closeDelay={0} openDelay={0}>
    <TooltipTrigger>Hover Me</TooltipTrigger>
    <Portal>
      <TooltipPositioner>
        <TooltipContent>I am a tooltip!</TooltipContent>
      </TooltipPositioner>
    </Portal>
  </Tooltip>
)
Positioning:
const Positioning = () => (
  <Tooltip
    positioning={{ placement: 'left-start', gutter: 16, offset: { mainAxis: 12, crossAxis: 12 } }}
  >
    <TooltipTrigger>Hover Me</TooltipTrigger>
    <Portal>
      <TooltipPositioner>
        <TooltipContent>I am a tooltip!</TooltipContent>
      </TooltipPositioner>
    </Portal>
  </Tooltip>
)
